message:
Dear Interviewer,

The interview for {{ doc.custom_applicant_name }} has been rescheduled.

  • Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.scheduled_on) }}
  • From: {{ frappe.utils.format_time(doc.from_time) }}
  • To: {{ frappe.utils.format_time(doc.to_time) }}

Thank you
name: Interview Rescheduled Notification
subject: Interview Rescheduled - {{ doc.custom_applicant_name }}
